title: Replace words with sed
description: In the file 'data/sample_doc.txt', replace all occurrences of the word 'avonturen' with 'adventures'.
man_page_info:
sed - stream editor for filtering and transforming text.
Example: sed [OPTION]... 'script' [INPUTFILE...]
Key commands: s (substitute, e.g., s/old/new/g).

input_details.prompt_for_command: Enter the sed command to replace words:

evaluation.expected_stdout:
This is a test document for command-line practice.
Let's see if you can find specific words.
This line contains the word adventures.
Another line here, just for fun.
More adventures can be found if you look closely.
Not all lines have the target word.
The end of the adventures in this document.

hints: The 'g' flag means replace globally on each line.
Remember to specify the input file.
